title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate embeddings, pull/manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, embeddings or tools inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri-based desktop GUI for chatting with local Ollama models (macOS, Linux, Windows).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-enhanced CLI with interactive REPL, syntax highlighting, conversation history, and plugins.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement (inline completions & chat).

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Another VS Code extension: sidebar chat, code explanation, generation, refactoring using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (Alpine & Ubuntu) with multi-arch support and CUDA runtime for GPU inference.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Next.js chatbot UI with authentication, chat history persistence, and OpenAI-compatible endpoint fallback.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama: sync/async APIs, POJO model mapping, Spring Boot starter included.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET SDK with strongly-typed requests/responses and IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, brainstorm ideas, and answer questions using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama's REST API with async/await, streams, and native JSON mapping.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing typed REST client and async streaming support for Ollama.
